title: Muir Woods National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Please visit our education team's website for complete information on education programs at Muir Woods and to register for education programs. Registration opens  August 10, 2016.   Â    The following educational programs are offered at Muir Woods National Monument: - Into the Redwood Forest immerses 3rd and 4th grade clue-seeking scientists in the wonders of Muir Woods, from the very small to the very tall. - Rings, Ripples, & Echoes guides K-5 species spotters on a magical journey through Muir Woods and other natural communities along the Redwood Creek Watershed. - For a general overview of the park before your school group enters the forest, you may call our office to schedule a ten minute program with a ranger. Please call (415)388-2596.
